title: pAlimpavE nannu
sahitya:
pAlimpavE nannu phaNipati shAyi


anupallavi

  cAlincu kOpamu cAla nIku mrokkEnu


caraNam 1    kanna taNDri nApai karuNalEka iTu nannalayincuTa nyAyamu gAdu sumi
    caraNam 2    centaku rammani cAla nE vETaga vinta mATalADEdi vEDuka gAdu sumi
    caraNam 3    tALajAlanurA dayajUDa vELarA bAla gOpAladAsa bhakta pOSaka ikanu
